name: Hero Banner Slider
author: Rohit Gupta

sections.description:
This is A Hero Banner Slider plugin for Gutenberg editor. It makes use of all the options provided by bxslider. You can also add other features like Title, Description of banner. This plugin lets you change the order of slides using drag & drop functionality.

Key Features

  • Hero banner with slider
  • Drag and drop ordering feature
  • Edit and Remove the slider
  • Slider Details Alignment options
  • Overlay edit options (color, opacity)
  • Bxslider most used options (autoplay, pager, controls, speed, mode, etc)
sections.installation:
To install the plugin automatically:

  • Gutenberg plugin needs to be installed first.
  • Now Go to WordPress adminside, and navigate from: Plugin > Add new
  • Search for Hero Banner Slider.
  • Click on install after that click on activate link.

To install the plugin manually:

  • Gutenberg plugin needs to be installed first.
  • Download the plugin and unzip it.
  • Now upload the plugin directory to /wp-content/plugins/
  • For plugin activation, go to the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress & activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
Q. In which WordPress version this Plugin is compatible?

Ans: It is compatible with a 5.0+ WordPress version.

Q. Is this compatible with any theme?

Ans: Yes, you can used this plugin for any theme.
